content.raw:
Hi, 

Currently I have 2 links in the WAMV model - base_link, and a buoyancy_link. the buoyancy_link is aligned with the z axis of the skis, while base_link is an arbitrary reference. None of the frames are located at the center of mass. After varying the bodyName from base_link to buoyancy_link in the usv_gazebo_dynamics plugin, I noticed that this does not change the equilibrium position of the WAMV. Could I check if the position of the WAMV used to calculate the upthrust depends on the position of the these links? 

Otherwise, which frame is being passed to the usv_gazebo_plugin to calculate the upthrust?
